title: CAEN detector calibration
description: The detector calibration information needed by the EFU for CAEN based detectors

date.description: A calibration reference time in UTC

info.description: A descriptive string to identify the calibration

instrument.description: The name of the instrument this calibration applies to

units.description: The number of detector units per detector group

version.description: An integer version number for this format specification

contains.description: A group of one or more detector units

groupindex.description: A detector-unique index identifying this group

intervals.description: Per unit limits on global charge division: unit_x = (x - interval[unit][0]) / (interval[unit][1] - interval[unit][0])

polynomials.description: Per unit local x correction polynomial coefficients

thresholds.description: Per unit limits on total pulse-height ADC value(s)
